name: colemakclub
description: This site is a fork of [Colemak Academy](https://colemak.academy/), a resource for learning Colemak and related keyboard layouts. The main purpose of this fork was to fix its very incorrect implementation of Colemak-DH. It was starting to become quite a problem for the [Colemak Community](https://discordapp.com/invite/3UkgpGC), as many were investing significant time into learning the wrong layout! However, this fork is now a platform for the community to add additional improvements.
